body.name: BELLA 3 Qt Touchscreen Air Fryer Oven and 5-in-1 Multicooker with Removable NonstickDishwasher Safe Crisping Tray and Basket, 1400 Watt Heating System, Matte White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: EFFORTLESS COOKING AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: Say goodbye to complicated buttons and hello to delicious, hassle-free dishes! Our small air fryers boast a digital touchscreen, which make cooking easy and fun. Enjoy creating delicious, gourmet meals in minutes

PERFECT FOR SMALL GATHERINGS: With a capacity of up to 2.5 pounds of food, this mini air fryer can feed up to 2-4 people. From crispy french fries and fish sticks to mouthwatering chicken thighs and wings, it's a crowd-pleaser for any occasion

UNLEASH YOUR CULINARY CREATIVITY: Our 5-IN-1 Multi-Cooker lets you Air Fry, Broil, Bake, Roast, or Reheat meals with ease. Powered by a 1400 watt heating element and Circular Heat Technology, the deep fryer ensure even cooking and always-crispy foods

INDULGE IN HEALTHY DELIGHTS: Enjoy guilt-free meals with 88% less fat and 65% fewer calories than typical fast food restaurants. The PFOA-free Nonstick basket and crisping tray are removable and dishwasher safe, making cleanup of the mini oven a breeze

COMPACT SIZE: Thanks to its compact size, our electric fryer fits easily on any countertop, saving you valuable space without sacrificing performance. These kitchen appliances are absolute new house essentials and a must-have for your college dorm
body.description: Discover a world of culinary possibilities with the BELLA Digital Air Fryer and let your creativity soar in the kitchen. Elevate your cooking game, simplify your life, and add a touch of joy to every meal. At BELLA, we're passionate about making your countertops vibrant and exciting. We've created a range of kitchen small appliances that add fun and excitement to your cooking journey, and our small air fryer is a shining example of our commitment. Its compact size easily fits any kitchen counter, saving you valuable space while adding a pop of color to your culinary haven. We've packed it with versatile features to unleash your culinary creativity. With our 5-IN-1 Multi-Cooker, you can air fry, broil, bake, roast, or reheat meals with ease. Explore the included recipe book for endless inspiration and discover new flavors that will tantalize your taste buds. Powered by a 1400 watt heating element and our innovative Circular Heat Technology, our deep fryer ensures your dishes come out crispy and evenly cooked with NO PREHEAT needed. No more waiting around—get your food on the table faster than ever and impress your loved ones with your culinary prowess.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MY BELLA in White
reviews.reviewText: I love air fryers, don't you? This one is just right for a single person. I've used it for about a month and it is so much easier to clean than the one its replacing. Cooks steaks very nicely, in fact everything I have attempted has come out perfect. And I'm no Julia Childs by any stretch of the imagination!!! I use it almost daily and it performs like a pro. Arrived as promised, nice packaging to protect the unit, no issues understanding the instructions. I highly recommend this fryer for couples or singles, too small for a family of 3.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Bella Air-fryer is great!!
reviews.reviewText: This 2.9 Bella air-fryer is a perfect size for 2 people, easy to use and is a very nice red color. It matches some of my red accent things in the kitchen. The food tastes fantastic and very yummy! I have no complaints at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I Took The Plunge!
reviews.reviewText: I love to cook but do not like kitchen gadgets littering my countertops. I received an Amazon gift card that would pretty much cover the cost of the item, so I took the plunge. I am pleasantly surprised and use it a lot. It is awesome for bacon!!! Easy to use and easy to clean. It is just my husband and I and I primarily use it for meat at this point. It will be great in the wintertime for meats when the snow is blowing outside! The color matches my kitchen cabinets perfectly so that helped sway my decision. It works great and I am very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Purchased to be a backup, destined to become my primary unit
reviews.reviewText: To be honest, I really wasn't expecting much. My beloved Cosori was under recall, and I looked for one of the least expensive air fryers available, so that I could still cook my daily "hash browns" for breakfast.Well, considering that Cosori has more than fumbled the football by making me wait 2 months for a replacement, and the fact that this little air fryer actually out performs the Cosori, this might be the airfryer that reigns supreme in my Kitchen.The small size of this fryer means there is almost no need to "preheat" the unit. It is much quieter than my Cosori, and the touch screen controls are intuitive and responsive.The system does not have a "dual basket" system, but instead has an "screen insert" which simply raises the product about 1/4 inch off the bottom to allow airflow underneath. It works fantastic. And is much easier to clean than Cosori's two basket system. I've done French Fries, and Hashbrowns and Garlic Toast in this little unit just like I did in the Cosori, and it has achieved equal results with equal speed. Good Job Bella.My replacement Cosori, if it ever arrives, is going to be relegated to the pantry, and we'll bring it out only if we need to. In the meantime, Bella gets the use and the counterspace. And at $50.00 you can't ask for much more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luv the modern look . Basket is sturdy easy to clean . Quilter then last air fryer
reviews.reviewText: The handle area feels cheap & must open carefully so not to break off handle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: I have used this to cook bacon, chicken, french fries, tater tots, and more! This is the third air fryer I've had and it is by far the best! Easy to use, with a varied menu of ways to cook in it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How did I love without this??
reviews.reviewText: I resisted purchasing an air fryer in spite of the fact that everyone I know that had one raves about them. I get it now. I’m glad I bought this model. It’s large enough, super easy to clean. I wish the print on the controls were a bit larger so my near-blind mom could use it for her beloved egg rolls, but it’s fine for people that can see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The was the perfect gift for my daughter she loves it

The door was very stiff and did not close properly on the one side which is why I returned it. The colour of this air fryer was great.Received on time, was packaged well and my return was processed fast.
OMG ! The BEST baked potatoes in the history of the world ! Love my air fryer , so tasty and easy to use .
Make sure you bake the air fryer first. It gets rid of the plastic smell. Then it's ready for use.I love mine. and I do recommend this Bella air fryer..thanx..

There was a weird “new” smell that impacted the taste for the first week or so, but someone told me to season it which helped. (Research: how to season air fryer). I love it and use it several times a week now. It is easy to use, easy to clean, and I love all the different preset options. It is on the small size but big enough for one or two people and looks great in the kitchen. I definitely recommend it!
Have been using this for the past few weeks. Works really well and is so fast. Controls are easy to use and cleaning it is fast and painless. Very happy with it overall.
